title: Waist Belt
description: center 2-1/4\" black and green woven horizontal geometric strip brodered by red, yellow and black woven bands spaced by heavier vertical weft shot every 2-1/2\"; twelve 3-1/2\" multicolored tassels with silvered glass beads on each end
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
